Before jumping straight into analyzing data, itâ€™s important to know how the R language works. 1.2 Step 2. library(DiagrammeR) library(htmlwidgets) # Create a flowchart with links to bookdown chapters graph <- grViz(" digraph flowchart { node [shape = box, style = filled, fillcolor = lightblue] # Nodes with embedded hyperlinks to bookdown chapters A [label = <<TABLE BORDER=\"0\"><TR><TD HREF=\"https://yourbookdownsite.com/introduction.html\" TARGET=\"_blank\">Introduction</TD></TR></TABLE>>] B [label = <<TABLE BORDER=\"0\"><TR><TD HREF=\"https://yourbookdownsite.com/chapter1.html\" TARGET=\"_blank\">Chapter 1</TD></TR></TABLE>>] C [label = <<TABLE BORDER=\"0\"><TR><TD HREF=\"https://yourbookdownsite.com/chapter2.html\" TARGET=\"_blank\">Chapter 2</TD></TR></TABLE>>] D [label = <<TABLE BORDER=\"0\"><TR><TD HREF=\"https://yourbookdownsite.com/conclusion.html\" TARGET=\"_blank\">Conclusion</TD></TR></TABLE>>] # Edges A -> B B -> C C -> D } ") # Display the graph graph
